law.catch_line: To qualify under the Program, a long-term care policy shall:...
law.text:
To qualify under the Program, a long-term care policy shall:
Satisfy the requirements of § 1917(b) of the Social Security Act and any applicable federal guidelines;
Satisfy the requirements of Title 18 of the Insurance Article; and
Alert the purchaser to the availability of consumer information and public education provided by the Commissioner under § 15-406 of this subtitle in accordance with any applicable federal guidelines.
